data.text:
Fantastic! We stayed in room 327 which was a double room with a single bed & dressing room attached. The hotel was clean in an amazing location for visiting the city, Olympic pool, beach etc. 
The staff - professional, kind, helpful and all speaking great English to assist with any queries we had. 
The roof terrace - wow the views! 
Thank you so much all of you for a great family holiday in Barcelona ❤️
data.title: Fantastic hotel - central to everything

user_location.name: Bognor Regis, Arun District, West Sussex, England

data.text:
Initially chosen for location and its proximity to one of Gaudi’s less known buildings. 

It turns out that La Rambla is no longer one of Barcelona’s prime locations, as in recent years it’s lost its glamour to the awful nightlife that takes over at around 11:00 each night. 

My recommendation is that you stay elsewhere in the city, but if you just stay near La Rambla, this is one of the best value-for-money options, and you get fantastic views from the rooftop. 

Good breakfast too and adequate reception service.
data.title: Good hotel, don’t go out after 23.00 h.

data.text: Second visit to this Very centrally located hotel, the room was the correct size for a 2 nights stay. The room and bathroom were very clean and had everything one needed. The hotel terrace has a lovely view of the city and the staff is professional and kind. I can’t wait to come back to Barcelona!!
data.title: Lovely hotel in central Barcelona.

data.text:
Great hotel, we stayed for 4 nights - the room was lovely, had everything we needed and was cleaned daily.
Location was excellent, just off the Ramblas so nice and close to everything. 

Breakfast was great, such a wide variety of food and drinks available we were amazed at how much there was on offer for breakfast.

Staff were extremely friendly and helpful, our flight home was a later evening flight. The reception staff arranged to store our luggage for us free of charge until we were ready to head to the airport which was brilliant and a huge help to us. Also loved the roof terrace. 

100% would visit this hotel again, great value for money
data.title: Excellent hotel, ideal location. Great value for money

data.text:
This was my 6th trip to Barcelona as it’s my favourite place to be in the world but always had rather hit or miss experiences with the hotels I’ve stayed at…not this one. This is hands down the best one i have stayed at while in the city. 

We arrived early Sunday morning (10/3/24) and were greeted with the sight of the rather grand Güell Palace which is directly across the road from the hotel, then greeted with the extremely friendly and attentive reception staff, again, hotel staff all around the world can be hit and miss in terms of general friendliness and helpfulness but the staff here go above and beyond to make you feel welcome and are more than happy to give you helpful tips on where to eat and shop. Perfecte! 

The rooms are extremely clean with cleaning staff cleaning the rooms daily. In terms of dining I would urge anyone who stays to go for the breakfast option with booking as it caters for every palate and nationality imaginable with the freshest pastries, cereals, meats and cheeses on offer. 

The rather picky previous reviews about the No tea or coffee making facilities kind of deafeats the object of the hotel bar/cafe and the many wonderful independent coffee shop surrounding you in the Barrio Gothic. 

On our last day we’re were allowed to keep our baggage in a storage area in the car park next door as our flight was later that evening, a service I’ve never previously seen executed without a fee involved, these guys don’t charge for this facility which is incredible! The lady on reception even offered us the restroom and one more look on the breathtaking roof top terrace over looking the city (which is a must!) Before we left. 

I actually left this hotel heavy hearted as I didn’t want to leave! We will 100% be back when in Barca again! Moltes Gracies to everyone at the Gaudi Hotel!
data.title: The best hotel in the City!

user_location.name: Swansea, Swansea County, South Wales, Wales
